dict.string: Before completing this exercise, you will need to define a conversation in the Watson Assistant tool. Please refer to the Prerequisite section for instructions on how to do this.
Use the `tj.converse(workspaceId:message:)` method to send a message to the Watson Assistant service and receive the response.
The `ConversationResponse` returned from Watson contains a `text` property containing the textual response. This property should be spoken by TJBot using `tj.speak(_:)`.
Not seeing the results you expect? Be sure to check the `error` property of the `ConversationResponse`.
